items.title: Agents
items.description: - Agents can now rejoin the console using the same name after being removed from the console.

items.title: Detections
items.description: - Detection rules will now have the Cyber Kill Chain phases saved on the rule for additional context.

items.title: Architecture
items.description: - Reflex now supports running the API with multiple instances behind a load balancer.

items.title: Event Rules
items.description: - Fixed an issue where event rules with intel match would not trigger if the source document was missing the desired field.
